items.name: Conch Coast Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: Embark on a pirate-themed treasure hunt along the scenic coast, solving riddles and deciphering maps to find the hidden loot.
items.address: East Bay Beach, South Caicos

items.name: Mangrove Maze Quest
items.short_description: Navigate a specially designed maze within the natural mangrove ecosystem, learning about local wildlife as you go. Ideal for young explorers.
items.address: Near the Salt Ponds, South Caicos

items.name: Island Explorer's Challenge
items.short_description: A self-guided quest that takes families around Cockburn Harbour, solving riddles related to South Caicos' history and landmarks.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Waterfront, South Caicos

items.name: Lighthouse Mystery Trail
items.short_description: Follow a trail of clues leading to the historic lighthouse, uncovering a fictional local mystery and a small 'treasure' at the end.
items.address: Near the South Caicos Lighthouse, South Caicos

items.name: Caicos Dino Dig Site
items.short_description: An interactive paleontological dig site where kids can unearth replica dinosaur bones and fossils in a giant sandpit.
items.address: Sailrock Resort Area, South Caicos

items.name: Lost Lagoon Dino Trails
items.short_description: Walk through a themed jungle trail featuring life-sized dinosaur models, some with animatronic movements and sounds, amidst lush greenery.
items.address: Near South Caicos Airport, South Caicos

items.name: Prehistoric Ponds Adventure
items.short_description: An educational park focusing on aquatic prehistoric life, with models of marine reptiles and exhibits explaining ancient ecosystems.
items.address: Salina Bay, South Caicos

items.name: Dino Discovery Garden
items.short_description: A smaller, family-friendly garden featuring static dinosaur models, interactive facts, and plants from the Mesozoic era.
items.address: High Street, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: Salt Cay Splash Pad
items.short_description: A fun, zero-depth splash pad featuring fountains, misters, and small water features, perfect for toddlers and young children to cool off.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Park, South Caicos

items.name: Conch Cove Water Slides
items.short_description: A collection of small, safe water slides and gentle aquatic play structures designed specifically for children up to age 10.
items.address: Sailrock Resort, South Caicos

items.name: Reef Runners River
items.short_description: A slow-moving lazy river themed with colorful coral reef decorations, allowing kids to float gently on tubes.
items.address: East Bay Beach Resort Area, South Caicos

items.name: Pirate's Paradise Lagoon
items.short_description: An interactive water playground featuring a large pirate ship, water cannons, climbing nets, and dumping buckets.
items.address: Near the Government Dock, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: Flamingo Flyer Carousel
items.short_description: A classic carousel ride adorned with beautifully hand-painted flamingos, conch shells, and other local wildlife, perfect for younger children.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Town Square, South Caicos

items.name: Mini Reef Roller Coaster
items.short_description: A gentle, child-friendly roller coaster with mild dips and turns, themed around an underwater reef adventure.
items.address: Near South Caicos Airport, South Caicos

items.name: Boiling Hole Bumper Boats
items.short_description: Navigate and bump into friends in small, electric bumper boats within a contained, shallow water area.
items.address: Boiling Hole Road, South Caicos

items.name: Sky-High Pirate Ship Swing
items.short_description: A miniature swinging pirate ship ride that offers a mild thrill as it swings back and forth, perfect for aspiring buccaneers.
items.address: East Bay Beach Promenade, South Caicos

items.name: South Caicos Community Playground
items.short_description: A well-maintained community playground offering traditional swings, slides, climbing frames, and open space for free play.
items.address: Middle Street, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: Sailrock Treehouse Trails
items.short_description: An adventure park featuring elevated wooden walkways, Rope bridges, and small treehouses amidst the natural vegetation, offering unique views.
items.address: Sailrock Resort, South Caicos

items.name: Coastal Climb & Slide Park
items.short_description: An ocean-themed adventure park with climbing structures resembling coral reefs, giant waves, and multiple slides for all ages.
items.address: East Bay Beach, South Caicos

items.name: Nature's Obstacle Course
items.short_description: A challenging yet safe obstacle course integrated into the island's natural landscape, featuring rope climbs, log bridges, and balance beams.
items.address: Near the Boiling Hole, South Caicos

items.name: Turks & Caicos Legends Garden
items.short_description: A tranquil garden featuring artistic interpretations and plaques detailing the rich folklore, myths, and legends of the Turks & Caicos Islands.
items.address: High Street, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: The Conch Shell Chronicles
items.short_description: An audio storytelling trail where visitors can scan QR codes on conch shells to listen to tales of the island's history, nature, and people.
items.address: Near the Salt Ponds, South Caicos

items.name: Shipwreck Tales Trail
items.short_description: Discover the dramatic stories of South Caicos' shipwrecks through interactive displays, props, and narrated tales along a coastal path.
items.address: East Bay Beach, South Caicos

items.name: The Whispering Walls Park
items.short_description: An open-air park adorned with vibrant murals and interactive installations that visually tell the stories of the island's past and present.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Waterfront, South Caicos

items.name: South Caicos Marine Discovery Centre
items.short_description: A hands-on children's museum dedicated to the rich marine life surrounding South Caicos, with interactive exhibits and touch tanks.
items.address: Government Dock Area, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: Island Heritage Exploratorium
items.short_description: Explore the history, culture, and traditions of the Turks & Caicos Islands through engaging, interactive exhibits and storytelling.
items.address: High Street, Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos

items.name: Little Engineers Lab
items.short_description: A STEM-focused museum space where kids can experiment with simple machines, robotics, and engineering challenges.
items.address: South Caicos Community Center, South Caicos

items.name: Artistic Caicos Studio
items.short_description: A creative studio within the museum offering hands-on art workshops, craft activities, and a gallery showcasing children's art inspired by the island.
items.address: Near the South Caicos Airport, South Caicos

items.name: South Caicos Mini Golf Circuit
items.short_description: A fun 18-hole mini-golf course with obstacles inspired by local landmarks and marine life, suitable for all ages.
items.address: Sailrock Resort, South Caicos

items.name: Beach Soccer & Volleyball Courts
items.short_description: Designated public beach courts for friendly games of beach soccer and volleyball, open for casual play.
items.address: East Bay Beach, South Caicos

items.name: Island Hoops Basketball Zone
items.short_description: An outdoor basketball court featuring adjustable hoops to accommodate players of various ages and skill levels.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Community Park, South Caicos

items.name: Kayak & Paddleboard Race Course
items.short_description: A supervised, buoyed course in a calm bay where kids can safely try out kayaking and paddleboarding, with rental equipment available.
items.address: Near the Government Dock, South Caicos

items.name: The Great Caicos Conjurer
items.short_description: An entertaining stage magic show featuring a local magician performing classic illusions and kid-friendly tricks with an island twist.
items.address: South Caicos Community Hall, Cockburn Harbour

items.name: Oceanic Illusions Tent
items.short_description: A cozy, intimate tent setting for close-up magic and dazzling illusions, offering an interactive experience for a smaller audience.
items.address: East Bay Beach Resort Area, South Caicos

items.name: Mystic Mangrove Magic Show
items.short_description: A unique magic show performed outdoors near the mangroves, blending nature with captivating tricks and environmental messages.
items.address: Near the Mangrove Boardwalk, South Caicos

items.name: Starlight Sorcery Spectacle
items.short_description: An enchanting evening show under the stars, combining magic, light projections, and storytelling for a truly mesmerizing experience.
items.address: Near South Caicos Airport, Open Air Venue

items.name: Caicos Block Builders Workshop
items.short_description: An expansive indoor play area filled with various types of building blocks – LEGO, Duplo, and large soft blocks – for freeform construction.
items.address: South Caicos Community Center, Cockburn Harbour

items.name: Island Architects Zone
items.short_description: A dedicated zone where kids can build their own structures using LEGO bricks or try to replicate famous South Caicos landmarks from pre-made models.
items.address: Sailrock Resort, South Caicos

items.name: Dig & Build Construction Site
items.short_description: A large outdoor sandpit equipped with toy excavators, dump trucks, and oversized building blocks for a hands-on construction experience.
items.address: Near the Airport, South Caicos

items.name: Robotics & Tech Bricks Lab
items.short_description: An interactive lab offering introductory workshops on robotics and programmable LEGO bricks, fostering an interest in technology.
items.address: Cockburn Harbour Community Center, South Caicos
